markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />command ([morph](/Traits.aspx?ID=113))    **Effect** You gain an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack matching the tattoo for 1 minute. It has the same damage as your best unarmed attack and has the same traits. Its damage type is bludgeoning for a fist or frog's jaws; piercing for an antler, fangs, horns, or most jaws; or slashing for claws.
name: command (morph)
